scripts.test-cov: node node_modules/istanbul-harmony/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha  -- -u exports --require should  --timeout 15000 --recursive test/ --bail
scripts.test-travis: node node_modules/istanbul-harmony/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -u exports --require should  --timeout 15000  --recursive test/ --bail
